name: Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion
description: Paying tribute to the classic Sega Genesis title “Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse,” “Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion” focuses on the fabled Castle of Illusion, which has fallen into Wasteland, an alternate world filled with 80 years of forgotten Disney characters and theme park attractions – and now forgotten video games. • Play as Mickey Mouse and utilize the core “Disney Epic Mickey” gameplay mechanic of paint and thinner in an attempt to save classic Disney Toon characters. • Engage in epic boss battles with familiar Disney villains using attacks involving the power of illusions to surprise players. This game is also available in Danish Norwegian and Swedish.
